payload.content: Software development is undergoing a renaissance.

name: Software development is undergoing a renaissance.
content: Software development is undergoing a renaissance.

payload.content: Since December, there's been a step function improvement in what tools like Codex can do, to the extent that some engineers at OpenAI now use it to write essentially all code, operations, and debugging, a significant change from its prior use for only unit tests.

name: Since December, there's been a step function improvement in what tools like Code
content: Since December, there's been a step function improvement in what tools like Codex can do, to the extent that some engineers at OpenAI now use it to write essentially all code, operations, and debugging, a significant change from its prior use for only unit tests.

payload.content: OpenAI is approaching retooling teams towards agentic software development by aiming for two goals by March 31st: (1) making interaction with an agent the primary tool for technical tasks, and (2) ensuring agent utilization is explicitly safe and productive enough to not require additional permissions for most workflows.

name: OpenAI is approaching retooling teams towards agentic software development by ai
content: OpenAI is approaching retooling teams towards agentic software development by aiming for two goals by March 31st: (1) making interaction with an agent the primary tool for technical tasks, and (2) ensuring agent utilization is explicitly safe and productive enough to not require additional permissions for most workflows.

payload.content: To facilitate agentic development, teams should designate an 'agents captain,' share experiences in internal channels, and conduct a company-wide Codex hackathon.

name: To facilitate agentic development, teams should designate an 'agents captain,' s
content: To facilitate agentic development, teams should designate an 'agents captain,' share experiences in internal channels, and conduct a company-wide Codex hackathon.

payload.content: For agentic development, create and maintain an AGENTS[.md] file for each project, updating it when the agent struggles, and write skills for tasks Codex performs, committing them to a shared skills directory.

name: For agentic development, create and maintain an AGENTS[.md] file for each projec
content: For agentic development, create and maintain an AGENTS[.md] file for each project, updating it when the agent struggles, and write skills for tasks Codex performs, committing them to a shared skills directory.

payload.content: Maintain an inventory of team tools and ensure they are agent-accessible, for example, via a CLI or MCP server.

name: Maintain an inventory of team tools and ensure they are agent-accessible, for ex
content: Maintain an inventory of team tools and ensure they are agent-accessible, for example, via a CLI or MCP server.

payload.content: Structure codebases to be agent-first by writing quick-to-run tests and creating high-quality interfaces between components.

name: Structure codebases to be agent-first by writing quick-to-run tests and creating
content: Structure codebases to be agent-first by writing quick-to-run tests and creating high-quality interfaces between components.

payload.content: To manage AI-generated code at scale, ensure a human is accountable for any merged code, maintaining the same review bar as for human-written code, and verifying the author understands their submission.

name: To manage AI-generated code at scale, ensure a human is accountable for any merg
content: To manage AI-generated code at scale, ensure a human is accountable for any merged code, maintaining the same review bar as for human-written code, and verifying the author understands their submission.

payload.content: Build basic infrastructure for agentic development, guided by internal user feedback, including observability, tracking agent trajectories, and central management of agent tools.

name: Build basic infrastructure for agentic development, guided by internal user feed
content: Build basic infrastructure for agentic development, guided by internal user feedback, including observability, tracking agent trajectories, and central management of agent tools.
